item.title: 【Cinema Center】SERIES - Queer As Folk US Season 4 (2000) [1080p AMZN WEBRip DD+ 5.1]
item.description:
8.5 • Average Runtime: 47m • 2000 • TV-MA
​
Description:​
Click to expand...
Brash humor and genuine emotion make up this series revolving around the lives, loves, ambitions, careers and friendships of a group of gay men and women living on Liberty Avenue in contemporary Pittsburgh, PA.​
Click to expand...
​
Details:​
Click to expand...
Creators: Ron Cowen, Daniel Lipman, Russell T. Davies
Starring: Gale Harold, Hal Sparks, Randy Harrison
Genres: Drama, Romance
Audio Language(s): English
Subtitles: English [CC]
Maturity Rating: TV-MA
Content Advisory: Sex & Nudity, Profanity, Alcohol, Drugs, & Smoking​
